channel.title: What should I do to farm emo rock cds?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "What should I do to farm emo rock cds?"

item.title: Re: What should I do to farm emo rock cds?
item.content:encoded: Yes, it does work (EDUT). Coupled with Ichi ramen, it's like a 100% chance. Add Hoclaus or Olmek… Well words cannot say it~

item.title: Re: What should I do to farm emo rock cds?
item.content:encoded: EDUT does work, and gives a near 100% chance to find them.

item.title: Re: What should I do to farm emo rock cds?
item.content:encoded:
Allies:

The HoClaus :Ally Drops appear 50% more than usual!
Olmek:Get two Items instead of one for Ally Drops!

Jutsu:
I Need This: +1 success, Double chance to Ally Drops

I'm not sure what season your character is, I Am Ike. Olmek is available for season 2+ players and The HoClaus is available to anyone who was around in December or is Season 3 and gets the filler themes. However, the 'I Need This' jutsu is taught by Good Boy and can be obtained in season 1 if your willing to do some of the wasteland missions.

Aside from that, I'd just recommend using your WhiteEye jutsu (not sure if EDUT works or not) on the B-ranked Tai mission 'Rock Out on Stage!'.

item.title: Re: What should I do to farm emo rock cds?
item.content:encoded: if you have olmek you could use sticky emosuke and olmek and then a jutsu that increases ally drop rates

item.title: Re: What should I do to farm emo rock cds?
item.content:encoded: Especially Sticky … there's an added drop of sticky threads, and that's the only place to get indestructable ones.

item.title: Re: What should I do to farm emo rock cds?
item.content:encoded: Wasteland Allies, Flutie, Sticky, Tubby or the Twins on the same team. They all have a chance to drop emo cd's. If you do not have them then just use emosuke and pray XD

item.title: What should I do to farm emo rock cds?
item.content:encoded:
I'm a white eye

Level: 50 - Jonin

Genjutsu: 16 (+3) Strength:+5 Range: 1-13 Free Successes: 1

Ninjutsu: 17 (+3) Strength:+4 Range: 1-14 Free Successes: 1

Taijutsu: 17 (+3) Strength:+4 Range: 1-14 Free Successes: 1

if that helps
